name: MineMasters
description:
-[ABOUT]-

A small game I made for a game jam! :D

My first time ever using Gamemaker studio (moved from unity) I hope I did well!

This game is pretty much empty but it was a fun learning experience! ;)

-[GAMEPLAY]-

Mine, uh mine and mine! with a tad of crafting an 1 buildable

-[CONTROLS]-

WASD - movement

Left Click - Swing / use

Right Click - Drop item

Tab - pause /

enjoy!
